[binaries]
c = 'ohos_sdk/native/llvm/bin/aarch64-linux-ohos-clang'
cpp = 'ohos_sdk/native/llvm/bin/aarch64-linux-ohos-clang++'
ar = 'ohos_sdk/native/llvm/bin/llvm-ar'
strip = 'ohos_sdk/native/llvm/bin/llvm-strip'
ld = 'ohos_sdk/native/llvm/bin/ld.lld'

pkgconfig = '/usr/bin/pkg-config'

[host_machine]
system = 'linux'
cpu_family = 'aarch64'
cpu = 'arm64-v8a'
endian = 'little'

[properties]
needs_exe_wrapper = true
skip_sanity_check = true
sys_root = ''
platform = 'generic'
pkg_config_libdir = 'lycium_root/usr/glib/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/fribidi/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/harfbuzz/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/fontconfig/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/freetype2/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/zlib/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/libpng/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/brotli/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/libxml2/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/cairo/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/pixman/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig:lycium_root/usr/libexpat/arm64-v8a/lib/pkgconfig'

[built-in options]
c_args = ['-D__MUSL__=1']
cpp_args = ['-D__MUSL__=1']
c_link_args = []
cpp_link_args = []
